about_the_game:
Nyamon Tamer - Retro Edition is a return to classic monster-taming genre. Tame Nyamon and explore a vast world filled with thrilling turn-based battles and a mysterious legend to uncover.


Begin Your Journey
Leave the home you grew up in, choose your first Nyamon and start your life as a Tamer.


Discover Diverse Regions
From arid deserts to freezing tundra, navigate challenging environments.


Explore a world teeming with Nyamon
Trap and tame 181 Nyamon each with powerful evolutions.


Battle Tamers and wild Nyamon
Step up and take on would-be challengers and dangerous foes in beautifully animated turn-based battles.


Join the Fight Club
The first rule is that tamers always accept a challenge... or not.


The forgotten legend
Uncover secrets, stumble upon side-quests and encounter eccentric characters.

name: Nyamon Tamer - Retro Edition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: Intel i7-6800k
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: Intel i7-6800k
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

short_description: Nyamon Tamer - Retro Edition is a return to classic monster-taming genre. Tame Nyamon and explore a vast world filled with thrilling turn-based battles and a mysterious legend to uncover. Tamer challenge... Accepted!
